Record.Value: Gas Mixing
Practical Training: Stage IV
Lean to mix gass
Welcome Cadet. Stationeer Command wants to test your knowledge of gas filtering and mixing, to ensure you can provide liveable fuels and liveable atmospheres for the bases you build for the ODA.

Your welder is out of gas, which means its time to demonstrate your skills in gas filtering and mixing, to create more fuel. Let's start at the beginning. Your waste tank is full of carbon dioxide you've breathed out. Plants will turn that into oxygen, if you open it in the hydroponics room.
Open your waste tank
Shut your waste tank
Plants breath out oxygen. You need this for your fuel mix. Build a passive vent in the highlighted position. We'll use this to collect oxygen from the room.
Get active vent.
Build active vent.
Go through the airlock to the gas room to build your mixing apparatus.
Go to gas room
You can use a filtration unit to separate out oxygen from the other gases in the hydroponic room atmosphere. Build a filtration unit in the highlighted position.
Get atmospherics kit from crate
Build filtration unit in highlighted position.
The filtration unit outputs both filtered and waste gas. Connect the device to the hydroponic room pipe network
Get the pipes from the crate
Connect the hydroponic gas network with pipes
You'll also be creating waste gas, so connect the filtration unit to the waste gas network, which expells outside.
Get the other Pipe kit from the crate
Connect the waste network with pipes from the crate
A filtration unit can filter out two gases simultaneously, but you need oxygen right now - so put an oxygen filter in the unit.
Get oxygen filter from crate
Add oxygen filter to filtration unit
In order to reduce the chance of your fuel accidentally igniting, it's a good idea to cool your gas. Passing your pipes outside, and adding radiators is a good way to do this.
Get Pipe Radiator from crate
Add pipe radiator in highlighted position
The ice crusher is also a good way to obtain certain gases. Connect the ice crusher's gas output to the 'volatile' gas network.
Get Ice Crusher from crate
Build Ice Crusher in highlighted position
Use Iron Sheets on the Ice Crusher
Complete the Ice crusher with cables

We'll use the ice crusher to produce volatile gas. Get the mining belt from the crate, then add the volatiles within to the ice crusher. You will have to move quickly, as the volatiles will being to melt as soon as they leave the ore belt (but will not melt in the ice crusher).
Get the Mining belt from the crate
Add stack of volatiles to ice crusher from the mining belt
Now build a gas mixer in the highlighted position - this will allow you to connect your two pipe networks and blend your fuel mix at the correct ratio.
Get the Gas mixer from crate
Build gas mixer at highlighted position
You need to make sure that you're not overpressuring your canister. Adding a pressure regulator will ensure you fill your canister safely.
Get the Pressure regulator from the Crate
Build pressure regulator in highlighted position.
Valves allow us to control the flow of gas's or liquids inside pipe because of this its a good
Get the Pipe Vavle from the crate
Place Valve in highlited position
You'll need a tank to store fuel, and recharge your cannister from. So attach a tank to the pipe network using a tank connector.
Get tank Connector from the crate
Build Tank Connector In highlighted position
The Gas Network is now set up Inset the empty tank and charge it up with new fuel
Get canister from crate
Insert canister into tank
To determine correct fuel ratio to fill your tank with. Consult Stationpedia to find correct fuel mix ratio.
Set gas mixer valve to 66:34
Consult Canister (Fuel) page in Stationpedia
Close Stationpedia Once you finish reading
Now set the pressure on the regulator. A safe pressure for canisters is to 5000kPa (5mPa)
Set pressure on regulator to 1950kPa
Great work Cadet! Now that everythings set up we can safely begin turnnig on our equitment and start producing fuel.
Go back to grow room and turn on the active vent
Return to the atmsopherics room and turn on the Gas mixer
Turn on the pressuie regulator
Turn on the Ice Crusher
Turn on the filter
The Volitiles and oxygen are currently waiting in the pipe so now its time to open the valves and let the gas flow into the gas mixer
Open the volitiles pipe valve
Open the Oxygen pipe valve
Now your canister is refilled, you can insert it into your welder
Put the fuel canister back into the weidler
Done! Good job! Press the button!
